loading packages
```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```
import raw data 
```{r}
fish_data<- read.csv(here("data", "raw", "fsh_perPass.csv"))

```

selecting important columns
```{r}
fish_data_abiotic<- fish_data %>% 
  select(siteID, waterTemp, dissolvedOxygen, ) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(waterTemp)) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(dissolvedOxygen))
```

mean of data by column 
```{r}
fish_data_abiotic %>% 
  filter(siteID == CRAM) %>% 
  summarise(mean(waterTemp)) %>% 
  summarise(mean(dissolvedOxygen))
```
